compliant.section:
五、網站對外的相關連結
本網站的網頁提供其他網站的網路連結，您也可經由本網站所提供的連 結，點選進入其他網站。但該連結網站不適用本網站的隱私權保護政策 ，您必須參考該連結網站中的隱私權保護政策。
compliant.legal provisions: This section does not directly relate to GDPR provisions, but it is good practice to inform users about the privacy practices of third-party websites.

compliant.section:
六、與第三人共用個人資料之政策
本網站絕不會提供、交換、出租或出售任何您的個人資料給其他個人、 團體、私人企業或公務機關，但有法律依據或合約義務者，不在此限。
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns with Article 6(1) regarding the lawfulness of processing, specifically mentioning legal bases for data sharing.

compliant.section:
前項但書之情形包括不限於：
經由您書面同意。
compliant.legal provisions: This aligns with Article 6(1)(a) - Consent of the data subject.
This aligns with Article 6(1)(c) - Processing is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation.

compliant.section: 為免除您生命、身體、自由或財產上之危險。
compliant.legal provisions: This aligns with Article 6(1)(d) - Processing is necessary to protect the vital interests of the data subject.
This could potentially align with Article 6(1)(f) - Legitimate interests - but needs further clarification on what constitutes 'your benefit'.

non_compliant.section: 與公務機關或學術研究機構合作，基於公共利益為統計或學術研究而 有必要，且資料經過提供者處理或蒐集著依其揭露方式無從識別特定 之當事人。
non_compliant.article provisions: While this section refers to public interest and anonymization, it lacks the specificity required by GDPR Article 5 (Principles relating to processing of personal data) and may not fully comply with Article 9(2)(j) for special categories of data.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the specific public interest purpose and ensure processing aligns with GDPR requirements for research and anonymization.  Explicitly mention the types of  'public authorities' involved.

non_compliant.section: 當您在網站的行為，違反服務條款或可能損害或妨礙網站與其他使用 者權益或導致任何人遭受損害時，經網站管理單位研析揭露您的個人 資料是為了辨識、聯絡或採取法律行動所必要者。
non_compliant.article provisions: This section needs to be more specific about the legal basis (Article 6(1)) for processing data in cases of violation. It should clearly state the types of violations and the necessity and proportionality of data disclosure.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the types of violations and the legal basis for processing, ensuring that data disclosure is necessary and proportionate to the violation.

non_compliant.section: 本網站委託廠商協助蒐集、處理或利用您的個人資料時，將對委外 廠商或個人善盡監督管理之責。
non_compliant.article provisions: While mentioning oversight, this section lacks the specifics required by Article 28 regarding data processing agreements with processors.
non_compliant.amend: Explicitly state that the website will have a written contract with data processors, outlining their responsibilities and data protection obligations as per Article 28.

non_compliant.section:
七、諮詢
如果您對本網站隱私權保護政策有任何疑問或意見，歡迎來信、來電。
non_compliant.article provisions: This section should provide more comprehensive information about data subject rights as per Articles 12-15 (right of access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing).
non_compliant.amend: Include clear information about how individuals can exercise their rights (access, rectification, erasure, etc.) and how to contact the website regarding data protection matters.

non_compliant.section:
八、隱私權保護政策之修正
本網站隱私權保護政策將因應需求隨時進行修正，修正後的條款將刊登於網站上。
non_compliant.article provisions: While mentioning updates, this section does not explicitly state how users will be informed of changes to the policy, as required by Article 13(2)(b).
non_compliant.amend: Clarify how users will be informed of any changes to the privacy policy, e.g., through prominent notices on the website or via email.
